As a runner, you'll find that cycling requires a different set of muscles and techniques, so it's great that you're acknowledging the need to focus on your cycling endurance.

A professional bike fitting is an excellent idea, especially if you're new to cycling or haven't had your bike fitted in a while. A proper bike fit can make a huge difference in your comfort, efficiency, and overall riding experience.

Here are some benefits of a professional bike fitting:

1. **Improved comfort**: A bike fitting ensures that your bike is adjusted to fit your body, reducing discomfort, pain, and fatigue.
2. **Increased efficiency**: A proper fit helps you maintain a more aerodynamic position, reducing air resistance and allowing you to ride more efficiently.
3. **Reduced risk of injury**: A bike fitting can help prevent common cycling injuries, such as knee strain, back pain, and neck discomfort, by ensuring that your body is in a neutral position.
4. **Better performance**: With a properly fitted bike, you'll be able to ride longer and stronger, as you'll be able to maintain a more efficient pedaling technique.

A professional bike fitter will assess your riding style, flexibility, and body measurements to make adjustments to your bike's saddle height, handlebar height, pedal position, and other components. They may also provide guidance on proper riding techniques and offer tips for improving your overall cycling performance.

Before you schedule a bike fitting, make sure to:

1. **Choose a reputable fitter**: Look for a certified bike fitter with experience working with cyclists of your level and discipline (road, mountain, or commuter).
2. **Bring your bike and gear**: Bring your bike, shoes, and any other gear you plan to use during the event.
3. **Be prepared to ride**: Be prepared to ride your bike during the fitting process, so wear your cycling clothes and be ready to pedal.
4. **Ask questions**: Don't hesitate to ask questions or seek clarification on any adjustments or recommendations made during the fitting process.

By investing in a professional bike fitting, you'll be able to ride more comfortably, efficiently, and safely, which will help you enjoy your charity cycling event and perform at your best.
